column3: Latest;Oddar Meanchey Province:------ A man who took a gun out for a spot of night hunting accidentally shot the rifle into his right ribs.------The hapless sharpshooter tried to walk home and called for help from his wife. The incident occurred at 11:30 pm on April 4
column5: at the back of the forest in Tram Chan village
column7: Trasien Prasat district.------The victim was named Kham Rum
column9: who lived in the commune. He was taken to hospital in Siem Reap. ------https://kbn.news/archives/120442
